raw_text:
MR. CHAITANYA DATTATRY MADHVI 
SAP PP ASSOCIATE CONSULTANT. 
Contact No: 7303219105 | Email ID: madhvi.chaitanya01@gmail.com | 
 
 CAREER OBJECTIVE 
 
A certified SAP S/4HANA PP Consultant with hands-on experience in Support projects and Data Migration initiatives. I 
bring a strong foundation in mechanical engineering, complemented by 4 years of experience in piping design and 2 
years in SAP Production Planning. 
SKILLS 
 
• 
Certified SAP ERP 6.0 EHP7 PP Consultant 
• 
Plan-to-Produce (P2P) Configuration – Strong ability to configure end-to-end P2P cycle including production 
orders, BOMs, routings, and work centers. 
• 
AMS Support & Hypercare – Experience in resolving tickets during the support phase. 
• 
Gap Fit Analysis – Skilled in identifying gaps between business processes and SAP standard and recommending 
feasible solutions.  
• 
Well acquainted with Master Data’s of PP & QM modules.  
• 
Data Migration & Master Data Management – Hands-on experience with data extraction, cleansing, validation, 
and field mapping. 
 
 PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
 
SAP PP ASSOCIATE CONSULTANT | Treadbinary Technology Pvt ltd | Thane 
JUNE 2023 – present.  
Project No-1 
 
Employer 
Treadbinary Technology Pvt Ltd 
Project Description 
SAP S/4HANA Implementation (Data Migration – P2P Master Data) 
Client 
GEA 
Position 
Associate PP Consultant 
Responsibilities 
• 
Cleansed, extracted, and validated P2P master data for SAP migration, 
coordinating with business users for accurate field mapping. 
• 
Conducted testing, reconciliation, and resolved master data issues 
impacting production planning and MRP. 
Project No-2 
 
Employer 
Treadbinary Technology Pvt Ltd 
Project Description 
Support Project (UMG) 
Client 
UMG 
Position 
Associate PP Consultant 
Responsibilities 
• 
Provided AMS Support for SAP PP processes including production 
order execution, master data correction, and error resolution. 
• 
Analyzed and resolved incidents related to CO15 confirmations, MIGO 
postings, and availability checks in CO09. 
• 
Corrected and maintained BOMs, Routings, and Work Centers to 
ensure data accuracy and consistency in production. 
• 
Documented frequently occurring issues and collaborated with cross-
functional teams for Change Request (CR) implementation. 
 
 
 
Project No-3 
 
Employer 
Treadbinary Technology Pvt Ltd 
Project Description 
SAP S/4HANA Support and Rollout 
Client 
ThyssenKrupp 
Position 
Associate PP Consultant 
Responsibilities 
• 
Provided AMS (Application Maintenance Support) for SAP PP module 
during the SAP S/4HANA rollout phase. 
• 
worked on resolving SAP PP issues raised by users (via tickets), handled 
minor configuration changes, corrected master data, service requests, 
and change requests as per SLA timelines.  
• 
Investigated errors related to BOMs, Routings, and Work Centers and 
coordinated corrections with functional and technical teams.  
• 
Collaborated with cross-functional modules (MM, SD) to resolve 
integration-related issues.  
• 
 Participated in unit and integration testing (SIT) and provided support 
during UAT and Go-Live.  
• 
Documented recurring issues, provided resolution steps, and 
contributed to the knowledge base for continuous improvement. 
                Project No-4 
 
Employer 
Treadbinary Technology Pvt Ltd 
Project Description 
BTP Cloud – ATP Development 
Client 
Internal R&D / BTP Cloud POC 
Position 
Associate PP Consultant 
Responsibilities 
• 
Developed and tested ATP functionality for procurement and production in 
SAP BTP Cloud. 
• 
Configured checking rules, checking groups, and scope of check for ATP 
scenarios. 
• 
Created test scenarios and executed test scripts for unit and integration 
testing. 
Project No-5 
 
Employer 
Treadbinary Technology Pvt Ltd 
Project Description 
SAP Hac Integration (Internal R&D) 
Client 
Internal  
Position 
Associate PP Consultant 
Responsibilities 
• 
Configured SAP HAC integration for automated production order 
creation using backend triggers. 
• 
Set up variant configuration parameters including dependencies and 
characteristic values. 
• 
Designed batch determination logic using batch search strategy types 
and selection classes. 
• 
Integrated Hac with PP master data elements such as routing, BOM, 
and work center. 
• 
Validated the Hac setup with test cases and system checks during 
internal POC phase.

configurations and customized them based on client-specific requirements.

PIPING DESIGN ENGINEER | TECHFINIX PVT LTD. | RABALE, NAVI MUMBAI 
APR 2023 TO MAY 2023

Worked on Wastewater Treatment Plant project. 
PIPING DESIGN ENGINEER | VEDAM DESIGN & TECHNICAL CONSULTANCY| THANE                                        DEC 2018 TO DEC 2022

Successfully completed the BWTS and Scrubber Retrofit design systems for multiple clients.

Designed the Fire Fighting, Fuel Oil, and Bilge system for INDIAN Navy Vessel INS-Brahmaputra.
